quote: If you don't ask, you're not going to get. So if you're not familiar with the way to do it, if you're an agent, connect with your lender, ask them, do you facilitate 2-1 buy downs?
why_clipworthy: It provides a clear, actionable tactic that agents can implement immediately to help clients in a high-rate environment.
suggested_hook: Unlock affordable home buying with this simple question to your lender!
